qas.question: What do most Valencian people think Valencian is in regards to Catalan?
When was an opinion poll done concerning Valencian?
Who is less likely to believe that Catalan and Valencian are different?
Who uses a Valencian standard separate from Catalan?
How many scholars outside of linguistics agree with the Royal Academy?

context: Despite the position of the official organizations, an opinion poll carried out <a1_0>between 2001 and 2004<a1_0/> showed that the majority of the Valencian people consider Valencian <a0_0>different<a0_0/> from Catalan. This position is promoted by people who do not use Valencian regularly. Furthermore, the data indicates that <a2_0>younger generations<a2_0/> educated in Valencian are much less likely to hold these views. <a4_0>A minority<a4_0/> of Valencian scholars active in fields other than linguistics defends the position of the <a3_0>Royal Academy of Valencian Culture<a3_0/> (Acadèmia de Cultura Valenciana, RACV), which uses for Valencian a standard independent from Catalan.
